label.en: Restore state of Output 1 after power failure
label.nl: Herstel status van Ouitput 1 na stroom uitval

label.en: Device saves last on/off status and restores it after a power failure
label.nl: Apparaat hersteld on/off status na stroom uitval

label.en: Device does not save on/off status and does not restore it after a power failure, it remains off
